title: The managed attributes schema
description: The managed attributes for the media metadata

id.description: ref to the identifier of the attribute

type.description: The type of the object being returned.

name.description: ref to the name of the managed attribute

managedAttributeType.description: ref to the type of the managed attribute

items.description: accepted value of the given managed attribute

acceptedValues.description: ref to the accepted values of the named attribute if any

createdDate.description: ref to the date this managed attribute was created.

description.description: ref to the description of the managed attribute in both English and French languages
